document.full_text: nyse euronext  directors rejected as too risky and lacking value a sweetened takeover offer from nasdaq omx group  and intercontinentalexchange , the second time in 11 days the board backed a lower bid from germany's deutsche boerse ag .
document.title: nyse board rejects sweetened nasdaq, ice bid
lines_and_colors: nyse euronext  directors rejected as too risky and lacking value a sweetened takeover offer from nasdaq omx group  and intercontinentalexchange , the second time in 11 days the board backed a lower bid from germany's deutsche boerse ag .
